name: TeleAuth Client Tools
short_description: The TeleAuth Client Tools are a set of Unix tools for the TeleAuth two-factor / two-channel authentication system (http://www.teleauth.com). This includes a commandline client and a set of PAM modules. Written in Perl and C for Linux, OSX and Solaris.
